overview: Collection of four short films.  Includes: Twin Reflections — The famous Christy twins give new meaning to the term "brotherly love" as they heat each other up to rock hard intensity.  Around The Rim — Terry, Jack and Bob have a wild sex break and prove that three is not a crowd.  School's Out — After chemistry class, Ted and Rusty get down to some heavy fucking and sucking.  Bad Company — Bob and Frank are not bad company… they give it to each other hot and hard!
title: School's Out
